roleset.name: perform a transaction

example.name: transact-v: see what I mean?
example.text: The current opportunities arise because the process for executing a buy or sell order in the actual stocks that make up the S & P 500 is more cumbersome than transacting in the futures market .

example.name: transact-v: with transaction
example.text: W.N. Whelen & Co. , of Georgetown , Del. , and its president , William N. Whelen Jr. , also of Georgetown , were barred from transacting principal trades for 90 days and were jointly fined $ 15,000 .

propbank.arg: W.N. Whelen & Co. , of Georgetown , Del. , and its president , William N. Whelen Jr. , also of Georgetown

example.name: transaction-n: Arg 1 as a kind of transaction
transaction-n: Adj where arg 1 may be tempted
transaction-n: Example with arg 0 and arg 2
example.text: The first RTC transaction with a foreign bank

roleset.note: TRANSACT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'transact' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. This is a stupid, stupid, stupid verb backformed from 'transaction'. (from transact.01-v predicate notes)
TRANSACTION-N NOTES: Roleset based on transact.01. No corresponding verbnet class. Framed by Katie (from transaction.01-n)
